TopicTitle: How to make custom particle effect

Articles.Content: so i make a particle effect for BDA i know i ask this for many time BUT ALWAYS THE PART TURN INVISIBLE OR THERE IS NO EXPLOSION pls help

No it has texture but no color over life time
